PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2012-07022012-05-31,  CIC,  ,  , 
ActImmigration and Refugee Protection Act
PrecisReappointment, effective November 26, 2012, of PAULE ROBITAILLE of Montréal, Quebec, as a full-time member of the Immigration and Refugee Board (Montréal Regional Office), to hold office during good behaviour until March 31, 2013 or until the day prior to the coming into force of the Balanced Refugee Reform Act, whichever is earlier.
